Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Ple-E (Plectasin deletion variant, synthetic AMPs; 2S=S, UCSS1a)
Sequence Information.Source: amino acid deletion, fungal defensin analog, fungi-derived, natural derivative

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is most similar (87.5%) toPlectasinC: 11%, G: 23%, K: 11%.Activity: active against Gram+ S. aureus ATCC 43300.Recombinant production:yeast:Pichia pastoris:  X33 strain,  pPICZaA plasmid, expressed supernatant was used for activity screen.Activity data provided by Jianhua Wang.
Literature Information.Author: Li X, Hao Y, Yang N, Mao R, Teng D, Wang J.2023
Literature Information.Title: Plectasin: from evolution to truncation, expression, and better druggability.
